last_episode_to_air.name: Boston Brawlers vs. The Pride of Polynesia
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Hala'ufias and the Schlehubers compete for $100,000.

name: The Quiz with Balls
overview: Hosted by comedian Jay Pharoah, families must work together as each contestant faces a quiz where each wrong answer results in a massive ball rapidly descending and knocking them into a pool below; the final dry family member plays the final round for a $100,000 grand prize.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Each episode of "The Quiz With Balls" features two families competing for $100,000 in a "battle of the balls." Standing on a high platform over a glistening pool, they must all work together as they face a multiple-choice quiz where each answer is allocated to a spot with a giant ball positioned up behind it. If the correct answer is chosen, the ball rolls down and stops just before colliding with the player -- if the answer is wrong, the massive ball rapidly descends and mercilessly whacks them into the pool below. The more players each team loses, the harder the questions get. The longer they last, the more money they bank, until one "dry" family member plays the final round for the $100,000 grand prize.

episodes.name: Beantown vs The Big Apple
episodes.overview: The Harris's and the Wheatley's go head-to-head to see who has what it takes to stay dry and conquer The Quiz with Balls! Get ready to test your knowledge in "Girl Groups," "Geography," "Famous Authors," "Foods" and more.

episodes.name: The Southern Showdown
episodes.overview: The Byars's and the Banks's go head-to-head; quiz topics include movies, sports and literature.

episodes.name: A Family Affair
episodes.overview: The Patel and Guillengo families go head-to-head; topics include pop music and astronomy.

episodes.name: Clash of the Coasts
episodes.overview: The Garciga and Buckalew families go head-to-head.

episodes.name: Brains vs. Brawns
episodes.overview: The Brooks's and the Wyse's go head-to-head to see who has what it takes to stay dry and conquer The Quiz with Balls! Get ready to test your knowledge in "Books," "Fashion," "Music," "Movies" and more.

episodes.name: Football Frenzy
episodes.overview: The Guillorys and the Greshams go head-to-head to see who has what it takes to stay dry and conquer The Quiz with Balls!

episodes.name: School of Splash
episodes.overview: In the seventh episode, The McGlothins and the Bowsers go head-to-head to see who has what it takes to stay dry and conquer The Quiz with Balls! Get ready to test your knowledge in "Animal Science," "Film & TV," "Starry Nights," "Sports" and more.

episodes.name: Sister Act
episodes.overview: The Barneses and the Lees go head-to-head to see who has what it takes to stay dry and conquer The Quiz with Balls! Get ready to test your knowledge in "'90's TV," "Boy Bands," "Breakfast Foods," "Dating Apps" and more.

episodes.name: Mom Knows Best
episodes.overview: The Mitchells and the McGraws compete.

episodes.name: Boston Brawlers vs. The Pride of Polynesia
episodes.overview: The Hala'ufias and the Schlehubers compete for $100,000.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Each episode of "The Quiz With Balls" features two families competing for $100,000 in a "battle of the balls." Standing on a high platform over a glistening pool, they must all work together as they face a multiple-choice quiz where each answer is allocated to a spot with a giant ball positioned up behind it. If the correct answer is chosen, the ball rolls down and stops just before colliding with the player -- if the answer is wrong, the massive ball rapidly descends and mercilessly whacks them into the pool below. The more players each team loses, the harder the questions get. The longer they last, the more money they bank, until one "dry" family member plays the final round for the $100,000 grand prize.
